snippet: The announcement, made in an audio recording that was posted Monday to YouTube, is the clearest claim of responsibility of the fatal museum attack by members of the Islamic State group.
abstract: Militant group Jund al-Khilafah, which says it belongs to Islamic State, claims responsibility for massacre at National Bardo Museum in Tunisia and threatens further attacks in country.
lead_paragraph: The announcement, made in an audio recording that was posted Monday to YouTube, is the clearest claim of responsibility of the fatal museum attack by members of the Islamic State group.

headline.main: Group Linked to Islamic State Claims Responsibility for Tunisia Attack
headline.print_headline: Group Linked to Islamic State Claims Responsibility for Tunisia Attack
